title: English Textbook Development and Teacher Training Modules Using Graphic Oral History Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of English Teaching Methodologies, Intermediate or Higher English Proficiency, and Expertise in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields interested in developing science-integrated English instructional materials. Learners operate in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones (no PC access)

learning_goals: Learners can understand the educational utilization principles of graphic oral history materials and apply them to science field English textbooks
Learners can design and implement practical English textbook development processes through project-based collaboration
Learners can analyze and improve the effectiveness of textbooks developed based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
